bio: TidyMom, Foodie, Photographer, Spokesperson, Social Media Lover, Entrepreneur, Wife and Mom TidyMom.net a Lifestyle and Food Blog.  Cheryl Sousan is a self-proclaimed neat freak who loves to share her passion for baking, creating, photography and family.  TidyMom.net is a place where you will find family friendly recipes, diy and crafts, household tips and giveaways. editor/founder
